data.value: We believe that fashion and sustainability can go hand in hand. That's why we're committed to using eco-friendly and sustainable materials in all of our socks. Here are just a few of the materials we use:

data.value: Grown without harmful pesticides, organic cotton is better for the environment and safer for farmers.

data.value: A fast-growing, renewable resource that requires less water than traditional cotton, making it ideal for socks.

data.value: Made from eucalyptus trees, Tencel is a sustainable fabric known for its softness and moisture-wicking properties.

data.value: Hot water can cause your socks to shrink and lose their shape. To keep your socks looking their best, we recommend to wash them in cold water.

data.value: Fabric softeners can leave a residue, affecting their absorbency and breathability. Opt for a more natural solution like adding a little vinegar.

data.value: Avoid putting your socks in the dryer, as the high heat can cause them to shrink. Instead, you can hang your socks to dry on a clothesline or drying rack.

data.value: To keep your socks in good condition, we recommend to store them in a dry, cool place. Avoid storing them in direct sunlight or damp areas

data.value: I was on the hunt for a new pair of fun socks and stumbled across Ruby's site. I found an adorable pair of socks that fit my personality and my style. The quality and durability of these socks are superb! I will definitely be shopping with Ruby again in the future.

data.value: I have ordered a couple of pairs of socks and have been very happy with my purchase every time. The socks are delivered quickly, usually before I expect them. I love the variety of styles that Ruby offers and am always excited to see what new designs they come up with.

data.value: Love this company. Great quality, and a super fun selection of patterns. I've ordered several times from Ruby now and the process has always been extremely easy and quick. Not to mention their socks are just adorable. Highly recommend!

data.value: I love this store! They have a lot of gorgeous socks to choose from. I usually don't like to order too much the first time around, but there were so many beautiful patterns I had to choose four. My order arrived ahead of schedule, and they are just as beautiful in person as they are online.

data.value: I ordered the wrong size, and when I contacted them to ask what I should do, they immediately responded with a solution. The customer care is amazing, and the socks are of great quality (so soft!). I would definitely recommend purchasing from them!

data.value: Superb socks! Quality speed of service! This order came within a week. Where a different online giant couldn't get it together in a month!!! Thank you for being the best option! Would definitely order again and have already spoken of this to many others!!!
Recycle your old socks with us

data.value: We're dedicated to reducing waste and promoting sustainable practices. That's why we've partnered with SoleCycle to create a sock recycling program. Simply send your old socks back to us and we'll ensure they're recycled properly. Join us in creating a more sustainable future!
Join us and save 20% on your first order

data.value: Share your love for our socks by tagging us with @rubysocks or using the hashtag #rubysocks. We always enjoy seeing and sharing what you're up to, and keep an eye out for exclusive social media deals that might pop up from time to time!
